resources.string: Canberra is the capital of Australia
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas
Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake
Cairo is the capital of Egypt
China has invaded Japan many times
Russia is the largest country in area
United States is the largest country in population
Chad is the largest country in population in Africa
South Africa is the largest country in area in Africa
